description: C o m m e n t a r y   o n   t h e   d a i l y   p r a y e r s   ( o r i g i n a l l y   p a r t   o f   a   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   M a i m o n i d e s ' s   M i s h n e h   T o r a h   ( S e f e r   A h a v a h ) )
title: Commentary on the daily prayers (originally part of a commentary on Maimonides's Mishneh Torah (Sefer Ahavah))
